name: Grim Fandango Remastered - Soundtrack
detailed_description: The Grim Fandango Remastered Official Soundtrack features remastered original music from composer Peter McConnell of Monkey Island 2, Grim Fandango, and Psychonauts fame. Recorded with the help of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra, your ears are bound to be delighted.
